Package itec3030.assignments.a2

Class NewTempSensorAdapter

java.lang.Object
itec3030.assignments.a2.NewTempSensorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractNewTempSensorAdapter
public class NewTempSensorAdapter extends Object implements AbstractNewTempSensorAdapter
Abstract adapter class that implements interface TemperatureSensor class who is the Target class and implements component behaviour accordingly.
Author:
Danylo
